definition: to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of

sentences.english: Estrangement between father and daughter never had, and we can talk about anything.
sentences.chinese: 父女之間從未有過隔閡，我們無話不談。

sentences.english: We will have to make efforts for a long period of time before we can eliminate this estrangement.
sentences.chinese: 我們要做長期的工作，達到消除這種隔閡的目的。

sentences.english: Translating Mamma Mia! into Mandarin is meant to start the long process of bridging that gap.
sentences.chinese: 將媽媽咪呀翻譯成中文就是爲了開始彌合這種隔閡。

sentences.english: She wrote to Ralph and acquainted him with my conduct; this occasioned a breach between us .
sentences.chinese: 她寫信告訴拉爾夫我的行狀，這使我們之間有了隔閡。

sentences.english: The accumulation of the dispute, the husband and wife and estrangement from the alert, known as the "Strange Bedfellows ."
sentences.chinese: 糾紛的積累，夫妻從隔閡而戒備，俗稱“同牀異夢”。

sentences.english: Romain Rolland set out to portray the adventures of the soul of his hero and succeeded magnificently; in addition he broke down the artistic barrier between France and Germany.
sentences.chinese: 此外，他還消除了法國與德國之間的藝術隔閡。

sentences.english: So long as lovers have care for each other, discord and estrangement will be removed.
sentences.chinese: 只要彼此心中有着牽念，再多的齟齬隔閡，總會消除。

sentences.english: The biggest taboo is the estrangement between a mother and her daughter.
sentences.chinese: 最大的禁忌是一個母親和她的女兒之間的隔閡。

sentences.english: Martin's father worked hard to break down the barriers between the races.
sentences.chinese: 馬丁的父親致力於消除種族隔閡。

sentences.english: The political barrier obstructs the intercommunion in experimental theatre between two places.
sentences.chinese: 政治上的隔閡使得兩岸小劇場之間缺乏交流。

sentences.english: Travel and entertaining conversation will be informative and uplifting.
sentences.chinese: 旅行和交流富有成效，將是消除雙方隔閡的好辦法。

sentences.english: The conditions are present for eliminating this estrangement.
sentences.chinese: 我們是有條件消除民族隔閡的。

sentences.english: We should vigorously promote and protect human rights, increase dialogue and remove misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 積極促進和保障人權，加強對話，消除隔閡。

sentences.english: I don't want to sunder us.

definition: (fig.) gulf/chasm/wide gap/(originally) the Hong Canal in Henan, which in ancient times formed the border between enemies Chu 楚 and Han 漢|汉
not knowing which course to follow (idiom); at a loss what to do
to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
to drift apart/to become estranged/to alienate/estrangement
